page.title: 05Police
page.content: Different areas in Bramley have different problems. The private estates have stealing as their greatest problem, whereas council estates are more prone to assaults. There are enough policemen to cover the area with cars to help them. The main office is in Godalming and it looks after Haslemere, Cranleigh and other villages nearby. There was a relatively recent crime involving an eighteen year old boy vandalising the small Grafham Church, probably after having drink and drugs (drugs are only a small problem in the area). Burglar alarms are used by only a few people as 90% of them are set off accidentally and dogs are more effective.
